title: Second Woman Defends Claim That Herschel Walker Pressured Her for Abortion
description: An anonymous woman reiterated her claim that Mr. Walker, a nominee for Senate in Georgia, pressured her to have an abortion decades ago. The Times could not confirm the account.
dc:creator: Maya King
media:credit: Nicole Craine for The New York Times
media:description: Herschel Walker, the Republican candidate for U.S. Senate in Georgia, is running for office as an avowed abortion opponent.
